sql: ALTER TABLE "Transactions" ADD COLUMN "categoryId" integer DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "Transactions" ADD COLUMN "price" numeric(2) NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "Transactions" ADD COLUMN "currency" text NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "Transactions" ADD COLUMN "type" "transaction_type" NOT NULL;
ALTER TABLE "Transactions" ADD COLUMN "updatedAt" timestamp DEFAULT (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
ALTER TABLE "Transactions" ADD COLUMN "createdAt" timestamp DEFAULT now() NOT NULL;
